channel.title: Walking on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Walking on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: A journalist was walking the street, Carrying their notebook and sheets. They took notes along the way, Each one with careful sway, On the …
There was a doctor out walking, As he perused the town square, His stroll was so soothing, In the air was a bearing, That with each step, …
A daring pilot named Clyde Was walking quite bravely outside When he saw a plane He couldn’t restrain His need for adventure to ride!

A graceful dancer was walking, An enviable stride she was flocking, Her feet moved so light, Her grace was a sight, Her walk a true wonder …
